snippet: Despite efforts throughout the day in local churches to tamp down the outrage, the most chaotic violence in a week of unrest broke out in Ferguson, Mo., on Sunday night.
abstract: Crowds of protesters and police clash in worst violence yet during week of unrest over shooting death of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Mo; chaos erupts hours ahead of mandatory curfew, with hundreds of police turning out in riot gear, shooting rubber bullets and firing tear gas in effort to disperse demonstrators.

byline.original: By ALAN BLINDER and TANZINA VEGA
byline.contributor: John Eligon contributed reporting from Ferguson, Emma G. Fitzsimmons from New York, and Emmarie Huetteman from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Despite efforts throughout the day in local churches to tamp down the outrage, the most chaotic violence in a week of unrest broke out in Ferguson, Mo., on Sunday night.

headline.main: Violence Flares in Ferguson After Appeals for Harmony
headline.print_headline: Violence Flares After Appeals for Harmony
